mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG (FIN_ORG_NAME, FIN_ORG_CODE, FA_FIN_ORG_CODE) values (#{finOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faFinOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG
FIN_ORG_NAME,
FIN_ORG_CODE,
FA_FIN_ORG_CODE,
#{finOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{faFinOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG
FIN_ORG_NAME = #{finOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIN_ORG_CODE = #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = #{faFinOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code in( select fa_fin_org_code from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code in( select BANK_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_BANK_EVA_RELATIONSHIP WHERE EVA_COMPANY_CODE=#{evaCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

select * from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fa_fin_org_code=#{faFinOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fin_org_code in(select BANK_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_BANK_EVA_RELATIONSHIP WHERE EVA_COMPANY_CODE=#{evaCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select * from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code in (select distinct FA_FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in(select FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_SUP ts where ts.SUP_CAT='0'))
select TFO.*,TF.FIN_ORG_NAME FA_FIN_ORG_NAME from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG TFO LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG TF ON TFO.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE=TF.FIN_ORG_CODE where TFO.PKID=#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code in (select fa_fin_org_code from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code=#{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select * from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE = #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and PKID <> #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in (select fin_org_code from sctrans.T_TS_SUP where SUP_CAT=#{supCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code in (select FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in(select FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_SUP ts where ts.SUP_CAT='0'))
